lead_paragraph: CHANLER--Harvey, a former senior advertising executive and Forest Hills High School basketball standout, passed away on July 1 in New Canaan, CT. He was 87. Born in NYC to immigrant parents from Eastern Europe, Harvey maintained a great sense of humor throughout his life. He was a master of Ideas for Marketing. Harvey is survived by his children, Ann, Bill and Cliff and grandchildren, Alex, Kaya, Casey, Liliana, Cole and Catalina, and his three nieces, Patricia, Beryl, and Polly. Donations can be made to the Parkinson's Disease Foundation pdf.org 1/3
